title: Who Is Matthew Tkachuk’s Fiancée? Ellie Connell’s Job & Relationship History
description: Discover the private life of NHL star Matthew Tkachuk and his fiancée, a luxury travel advisor. Learn about their journey now! The post Who Is Matthew Tkachuk’s Fiancée? Ellie Connell’s Job & Relationship History appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Vritti Johar
excerpt: Get insights into Matthew Tkachuk’s relationship with his fiancée and discover their love story and engagement details.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Curious about Matthew Tkachuk’s relationship with his fiancée? The Florida Panthers star has kept much of his personal life private, but his engagement has sparked interest among fans. As he continues to excel in his hockey career, his fiancée has remained by his side, celebrating his milestones and successes. Let’s take a closer look at Matthew Tkachuk’s relationship, his journey with his fiancée, and what we know about their private life. Who is Matthew Tkachuk engaged to? Florida Panthers star Matthew Tkachuk is engaged to Ellie Connell. The couple has kept their relationship largely private but announced their engagement in April 2024, just months before Tkachuk won the Stanley Cup. While Tkachuk has shared a few photos of Connell on Instagram, she keeps her social media private. She stood by his side during the Panthers’ championship celebrations in June 2024. Tkachuk’s family, including his father, former NHL player Keith Tkachuk, joined them. What is Ellie Connell’s job? Ellie Connell works as a luxury travel advisor for Travel Untethered, a company specializing in curated travel experiences. Her private Instagram page links to her professional account, where she promotes her travel planning services. According to her bio on the travel company’s website, Connell has a passion for travel that began in her childhood in St. Louis, Missouri. She specializes in planning personalized vacations, ranging from luxury escapes to cultural immersion experiences, leveraging her global network to provide unique and seamless travel itineraries. Matthew Tkachuk and Ellie Connell’s relationship history The exact details of how and when Matthew Tkachuk and Ellie Connell met remain private. Their relationship became public in 2022 when Tkachuk shared vacation photos with Connell on Instagram. The couple made their first public appearance at the NHL Awards in June 2023. That year, Tkachuk was a finalist for the Hart Memorial Trophy. Connell revealed their engagement in April 2024 through screenshots from her private Instagram account. The photos captured Tkachuk proposing on a boat in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. Two months later, she joined Tkachuk and his family to celebrate as the Florida Panthers won the Stanley Cup, marking a milestone in both his career and personal life.
html:
Curious about Matthew Tkachuk’s relationship with his fiancée? The Florida Panthers star has kept much of his personal life private, but his engagement has sparked interest among fans. As he continues to excel in his hockey career, his fiancée has remained by his side, celebrating his milestones and successes.

Let’s take a closer look at Matthew Tkachuk’s relationship, his journey with his fiancée, and what we know about their private life.

Who is Matthew Tkachuk engaged to?

Florida Panthers star Matthew Tkachuk is engaged to Ellie Connell.

The couple has kept their relationship largely private but announced their engagement in April 2024, just months before Tkachuk won the Stanley Cup. While Tkachuk has shared a few photos of Connell on Instagram, she keeps her social media private. She stood by his side during the Panthers’ championship celebrations in June 2024. Tkachuk’s family, including his father, former NHL player Keith Tkachuk, joined them.

What is Ellie Connell’s job?

Ellie Connell works as a luxury travel advisor for Travel Untethered, a company specializing in curated travel experiences. Her private Instagram page links to her professional account, where she promotes her travel planning services.

According to her bio on the travel company’s website, Connell has a passion for travel that began in her childhood in St. Louis, Missouri. She specializes in planning personalized vacations, ranging from luxury escapes to cultural immersion experiences, leveraging her global network to provide unique and seamless travel itineraries.

Matthew Tkachuk and Ellie Connell’s relationship history

The exact details of how and when Matthew Tkachuk and Ellie Connell met remain private. Their relationship became public in 2022 when Tkachuk shared vacation photos with Connell on Instagram. The couple made their first public appearance at the NHL Awards in June 2023. That year, Tkachuk was a finalist for the Hart Memorial Trophy.

Connell revealed their engagement in April 2024 through screenshots from her private Instagram account. The photos captured Tkachuk proposing on a boat in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. Two months later, she joined Tkachuk and his family to celebrate as the Florida Panthers won the Stanley Cup, marking a milestone in both his career and personal life.
